channel.title: 2004/12 on Ian Wootten
channel.description: Recent content in 2004/12 on Ian Wootten

item.title: Vineyard reclaiming the web
item.description: Cardiff Vineyard have got to be the biggest bunch of bloggers I’ve ever met, in a non-derogitory sense. Makes a change to Yeovil Community Church. Browsing around their main site and links from it, I’ve found, hmm, lets see: Cardiff Vineyard Jon Matthias Helen Carslaw Lewis Parfitt Neil Morgan Zoë Morgan Sarah-Louise Thats crazy….! – We’ve got say 25 ppl max when I’ve gone along, so thats over a 5th turned blogging converts.

item.title: Simple PHP Gallery
item.description: I’ve got rid of the old phpautogallery that I had and dumped simple php gallery up instead. I’ve also converted shedloads of photos over so that peeps can see what I’ve been up to recently and not so recently. This includes most of the weddings I’ve attended over the last few years of very close friends, plus a few random ones for good measure. Check them all out here http://users.cs.cf.ac.uk/I.M.Wootten/gallery

item.title: Christmas feelings
item.description: Can it be December already? What have I been doing? Wheres the last 3 months gone? I have to say I feel more Christmas-sy this year in Cardiff than I have ever been up here. There seems to have been a bit of a build up so far.. Watching “Bad Santa” back in Nov (quite possibly the most amount of swearing I’ve ever seen in a film), going to Germany the other week with all the festive fun over there.
